author: Chrissie Redford
title: £1,735 raised for MacMillan charity at coffee morning held at Ingoldmells caravan park
description: A caravan park in Ingoldmells has kicked off fundraising for the annual Macmillan Coffee Morning by raising £1,735

author: The Associated Press
title: Gov. Newsom plans to transform San Quentin. Lawmakers and the public have had little input
description: Newsom wants to spend $360 million demolishing the building and replacing it with one more reminiscent of a college campus, with a student union, classrooms and possibly a coffee shop.

title: Gov. Newsom plans to transform San Quentin. Lawmakers and the public have had little input

author: Gene Marrano
title: Chris’s Coffee & Custard goes mobile
description: Chris’s Coffee & Custard goes mobile. The business hires young adults with special abilities and serves frozen treats and coffee out of their eatery at the 9th street Southeast Industrial Park. Thanks to donations from local organizations, the company was able to purchase a food truck that will be able to serve their products on […]The post Chris’s Coffee & Custard goes mobile first appeared on News/Talk 960-AM & FM-107.3 WFIR.

author: Kedung B Kapong
title: Op Dadu: Two coffee shops used as illegal gambling venues have power supply cut
description: KUCHING (Aug 30): Two coffee shops in Gita here had their electricity supply disconnected yesterday over their use as venues for illegal gambling activities. An operation to cut the power was conducted by Sarawak Energy personnel with assistance from police, as part of Op Dadu which has been ongoing since Jan 1 this year, said [...]

author: Breanna Schnurr
title: Coffee Briefing Aug 29. – Thinkific launches automated sales tax solution for creators; BTQ unveils ‘The Quantum State’ podcast; TMU and Xanadu collaborate on quantum computing research; and more
description: Coffee Briefings are timely deliveries of the latest ITWC headlines, interviews, and podcasts. Today’s Coffee Briefing is delivered by IT World Canada’s editorial team! author: mirrornews@mirror.co.uk (Amber O'Connor)
title: Cleaning fans rave over hair dryer trick that removes coffee table stains 'in seconds'
description: Say goodbye to unsightly stains as cleaning gurus have shared their trick for tackling dirty coffee tables, and the simple trick is said to work its magic within seconds

author: Maia Luem
title: CBD coffee shop in Platt Park targets fall opening
description: A new Platt Park coffee shop is going all in on CBD. Lavender Coffee Boutique is opening a one-stop-shop for CBD coffee, teas, and retail items at 1219 S. Pearl St. this fall.

author: Olivia Preston
title: Luton mum warns of burn danger after baby daughter scalded by hot coffee
description: Simona is raising money for the hospital which treated her daughter
